articles.content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. (WMC) -The Shelby County Health Departments newest health directive took effect Saturday. It puts restrictions on restaurants and businesses.

articles.title: New York reveals first case of COVID vaccine fraud - msnNOW
articles.description: Parcare Community Health Network is being investigated for allegedly acquiring up to 2,800 doses of the Moderna vaccine by fraudulent means, the state health department said Saturday.
